Record numbers (Sea/Ocean classification): Adriatic Sea: 4 , Ionian Sea: 18 , Tasman Sea: 1 ;
total: 23 .

Record numbers (FAO classification): FAO 37 : 22 , FAO 81 : 1 ;
total: 23 .
Remarks: This is a subtidal species with a disjunct distribution incorporating the type locality and neighbouring area with a marine cave in the Tasman Sea.
